Player History
Drafted in 59th round, 941st overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/23/2016 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Injured on 4/3/2017 with a Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/23/2017, off Andrew Weeks (COL)...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/14/2018 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
10/14/2018: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $700,000 per year, for 2 years.
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2019, off Russell Anderton (COL)...
Injured on 6/27/2019 with a Fractured Hip, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/14/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
